data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Farense push upfield but Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 5, Free kick Farense.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in high up the field for Farense in Faro.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Angel Gomes (Boavista) has received a yellow card from Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 11, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Farense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in Boavista.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 14, Farense have a goal kick.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Farense.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fabricio Isidoro for Farense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Boavista's Alberth Elis is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, The home team has substituted Fabricio Isidoro with Filipe Melo. Sergio Vieira is thus making his first change.
Goal! Ryan Gauld gives Farense a 1-0 lead in Faro.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Farense to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 28, In Faro Boavista attack through Show. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 30, Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Farense throw-in in Boavista's half.
In the minute 32, Claudio Falcao (Farense) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Farense.
Important block from the Farense defence as Nuno Valente Santos fires in a strike for Boavista.
In the minute 36, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Angel Gomes for Boavista gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 38, Farense have a goal kick.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 39, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Farense throw-in in Boavista's half.
Abner (Farense) has received a first yellow card.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Boavista.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Paulinho.
In the minute 42, In Faro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
At Estadio de Sao Luis, Boavista are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 43, Paulinho returns to the field for Boavista after picking up a slight injury.
Angel Gomes levels the score at 1-1.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
5 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Faro.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Farense.
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Farense.
In the minute 45, Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Farense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Boavista.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Boavista.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 49, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Boavista.
Farense to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Corner awarded to Farense.
In the minute 50, Goal! Nikola Stojiljkovic heads Farense into a 2-1 lead.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 53, Goal! Eduardo Mancha extends Farense's lead to 3-1 in Faro with a header.
Boavista pushes forward through Yanis Hamache, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 57, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a throw-in for Farense, close to Boavista's area.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 58, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yusupha Njie is on a sub for Javi Garcia for Boavista.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Show for Boavista drives towards goal at Estadio de Sao Luis. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 61, Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Boavista throw-in in Farense's half.
In the minute 62, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Faro Boavista drive forward through Nuno Valente Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Farense's Filipe Melo has been booked in Faro.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Farense to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Free kick in a good position for Farense!
In the minute 72, Amine Oudrhiri of Farense is pulled up for offside.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Patrick is replacing Nikola Stojiljkovic for the home team.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
At Estadio de Sao Luis, Brian Mansilla has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Boavista needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio de Sao Luis.
In the minute 76, Boavista make their second substitution with Gustavo Sauer replacing Paulinho.
Sebastian Perez is replacing Nuno Valente Santos for Boavista at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Boavista's Show gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Faro.
In the minute 81, Free kick Boavista.
Bilel Aouacheria (Farense) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Boavista.
Boavista are coming forward and Angel Gomes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Farense have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Boavista close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Vasco Seabra is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio de Sao Luis with Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez replacing Angel Gomes.
In the minute 86, Sergio Vieira (Farense) is making a third substitution, with Hugo Seco replacing Brian Mansilla.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Boavista in the half of Farense.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Bilel Aouacheria with Bura. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sergio Vieira.
Musa Juwara is replacing Yanis Hamache for Boavista at Estadio de Sao Luis.
At Estadio de Sao Luis the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Boavista's Yusupha Njie breaks free at Estadio de Sao Luis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Farense at Estadio de Sao Luis.
Can Boavista capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Farense's half?
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Farense.
In Faro Farense attack through Patrick. The finish is off target, however.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Boavista a goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
The match is over. Final score 3-1.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira waits before resuming play because Jorge Renan Benguche Ramirez for Boavista is still down.
